img_text: Hear Ye: Kanye West announces name change ahead of SNL Rapper says he wants to be known as 'Ye' as he prepares to launch new album Yandhi A Kanye West is expected to debut new music as well as his latest moniker with his appearance on Saturday Night Live. Photograph: Jonathan Brady/PA Kanye West has announced he is now to be known as Ye. The rapper has used the nickname for many years and even used it for the title of his June album He wrote on Twitter: "the being formally [sic] known as Kanye West. I am YE".
